events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the Software Engineer role, demonstrating strong experience in backend development.
Application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software and developer present in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s recruitment process moving forward.
The initial phone screening went well; the candidate demonstrated solid understanding of development frameworks and problem-solving skills.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about progressing to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week, targeting in-depth evaluation on software development and coding skills.
